text: læa xallxhˌ thrng tha cak sing thi phraxngkh thrng srang hı pen thi ngea rm kæ phwk cea læa phraxngkh thrng tha thiphak phing cak phukhea hı kæ phwk cea læa phraxngkh thrng tha kheruxng nunghm hı phwk cea pheux pxngkan phwk cea hı phn cak khwam rxn læa seux keraa pheux pxngkan phwk cea hı phn cak xantray nı yam sngkhram chen nan hæla phraxngkh thrng hı khwam pordpran khxng phraxngkh xyang khrbthwn kæ phwk cea pheux phwk cea ca di nxbnxm
